seo.title: Community - Join the LiftFire Fitness Community
seo.description: Join the LiftFire community! Connect with fitness enthusiasts, get support, contribute to development, and be part of the future of fitness tracking.
seo.keywords: LiftFire community,fitness community,Discord,GitHub,beta testing,fitness support,workout community,open source fitness

hero.title: Join the LiftFire Community
hero.description: Connect with thousands of fitness enthusiasts, contribute to LiftFire's development, and be part of a community that's transforming how we track and gamify fitness.

channels.title: Community Channels
channels.description: Choose the platform that works best for you to connect, learn, and contribute to the LiftFire ecosystem.

beta.title: Join Our Beta Program
beta.description: Get early access to new features, help shape LiftFire's future, and be among the first to experience cutting-edge fitness tracking innovations.

respectful.title: Be Respectful
respectful.description: Treat all community members with respect and kindness. We're all here to support each other's fitness journeys.

helpful.title: Be Helpful
helpful.description: Share your knowledge, answer questions, and help newcomers feel welcome in our community.

constructive.title: Be Constructive
constructive.description: Provide constructive feedback, report bugs responsibly, and contribute positively to discussions.
